title: About Us
description:
**Elite Commercial Door, Inc.** is a state licensed & insured premier company for all your automatic or manual commercial door needs.

Our Automatic Door technicians are AAADM certified, for quality service. [Contact us](/#contact-us) today for service, repairs and new installation.

***We also do Bullet Resistant Doors & Hardware!***

locationCard.title: South Florida
locationCard.description: Based in South Florida, we can service any of the Tri-County areas (Palm Beach, Broward or Miami-Dade) in short notice.

businessCard.title: 18 Years
businessCard.description: We are a family owned business with over 18 years in the commercial door industry

serviceCard.title: Service & Installation
serviceCard.description: We can service and install Automatic Door assemblies, Manual steel door assemblies, Storefront assemblies and all respective hardware.

image.alt: Nine team members arranged as a group, smiling at the camera
